title: Alquiler de piso en Santa Ponça
description:
Beautifully renovated commercial space converted into a modern studio apartment, fully furnished and ready to move in. Nestled in a quiet residential area within the exclusive Green Park community, this home offers comfort, privacy and a privileged natural setting.
Property Features:
Bright and spacious open-plan layout with kitchen, living, dining and bedroom areas.
Fully equipped kitchen with oven, ceramic hob, refrigerator and washer-dryer.
Air conditioning (hot and cold).
Fully furnished and move-in ready.
 Community Amenities:
Stunning communal swimming pool surrounded by lush gardens.
Sun loungers and a barbecue area for outdoor enjoyment.
 Rental Conditions:
Monthly rent: €1,350
Included in the rent: water, gas, community fees, internet, garbage collection and electricity (up to €50/month).
Deposit: 1 month’s rent + rent guarantee insurance of €2,000.
Discounts for advance payment:
6-month payment: €100/month discount
12-month payment: 1 month free rent.
